game.name: Riolympics
game.description:
The grand Rio Olympic Games have just begun and you have got participated in it as a candidate. Choose your country to play for and get ready to wear the crown of the next Olympic Champion. Have a good practice to learn the basic of the game so that you can rock on the field! Win matches, earn points and earn the advanced equipment! Improve your chances of winning by just following the instructions of your trainers in this brand new sport game for boys.

Choose from any of the disciplines, including Javelin Throw, Archery, Diving, Equestrian, Candeing, Weight Lifting, Fencing and Steeple Chase and start exploring it in your device. Grind your skills again and again during the practicing mode to get yourself ready to purchase the improved equipment and obtain results. Take the charge of proving your value as a great asset in the Official Rio Olympic Games 2016 after unlocking 8 disciplines.

Riolympics is a great free online fun activity where you will get a chance to explore different types of sports that you can see at the Olympics in Rio. Choose the sport you like and then decide the country you want to defend. It is going to be a big moment for your life since you will represent your chosen country for the first time in this cool PC game. Try to collect the maximum points and money in each of the disciplines. Give your character a look you like with the help of available clothes or hairstyle and lead him to the glorious victory!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Riolympics at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
